text.headline: Where i Went this Year?
text.text: So, this year I visited some art exhibitions in Jogjakarta and the surrounding. The COVID-19 pandemic has kept me away for a very long time since my last visit.

media.caption: A display of Artworks at GAMARUPA 2022

text.headline: GAMARUPA 2022
text.text: USER UGM's exhibition. For more photos, click here https://photos.app.goo.gl/3JndvjJRtQnTmUCr8

media.caption: One of the Artwork at FKY 2022

text.headline: FKY 2022 at Sleman
text.text: Festival Kebudayaan Yogyakarta (FKY) is one of the biggest exhibitions in Yogyakarta. Located in Museum Kotagede, I visited with my friend, Fitri. For more photos, click here https://photos.app.goo.gl/bfucywcb7pk4TciM8

media.caption: One of the Artworks at the Vidya Mulya Exhibition

text.headline: Vidya Mulya Exhibition
text.text: Located in Museum Sonobudoyo, I visited this exhibition on the last day. Met Yofi, Saras, and their friend also right there. For more photos, click here https://photos.app.goo.gl/86ruzVJsCabJdzPZ8

media.caption: It is one of the Artworks right there.

text.headline: Spatio-Temporal #5
text.text: An art exhibition was held by Interior Design Student from ISI Yogyakarta. Located at Jogja National Museum. For more photos click here https://photos.app.goo.gl/fEsuw781Pb7dGDc19

text.headline: Aditya Novali's Solo Exhibition
text.text: So, I visited the exhibition with my friend, Esya and Fitri at Tumurun Private Museum. For more photos click here https://photos.app.goo.gl/qUo3ZCdTrdm68ZVW6
